variations.description: Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of ATK to all enemies and increases their Magic DMG taken by 5% for 10 seconds. Can stack up to 10 times.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 140% of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 160% of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.
Deals Magic DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies per second for 3s.
Increases ATK by 12.5% during the first 30 seconds of combat.
Increases ATK by 25% during the first 30 seconds of combat.
